screen: % scons -Q cc -o file1.o -c file1.c cc -o file2.o -c file2.c cc -o file3.o -c file3.c cc -o prog file1.o file2.o file3.o % [CHANGE THE CONTENTS OF file2.c] % scons -Q --debug=explain scons: rebuilding `file2.o' because `file2.c' changed cc -o file2.o -c file2.c scons: rebuilding `prog' because `file2.o' changed cc -o prog file1.o file2.o file3.o
